title: Purdue University Degree

metadata.label: Acquired
metadata.value: May 2021, Purdue University, West Lafayette, Indiana

description:
Diploma paper.

This degree is a testament to Stephen E. Davis’ intellect, ambition and insanity. A proud recipient of a Bachelor of Science from Purdue University, Mr. Davis spent the years of 2017 - 2021 immersed in the world of computers, Mr. Akshay Pawar, missing deadlines and “world-renowned” ramen at Yatagarasu, Lafayette, Indiana.
